[兰]
From the cursive script of 藍 / 蓝 ( lán ) . Originally intended as the simplified form of 藍 / 蓝 ( lán ) but instead became designated as the simplified form of 蘭 / 兰 ( lán ) , which shares the same pronunciation as 藍 ( lán ) in Standard Mandarin .

[蘭]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *ɡ·raːn ): semantic 艹 ( “ plant ” ) + phonetic 闌 ( OC *ɡ·raːn ) .
